node.pagetitle: IT Services Company | IT Solutions & Support | TechVertu
node.metadescription: TechVertu is one of the best IT Support and IT services companies in Essex and Surrey. We offer free IT training to all new users and a Help Desk is always happy to help.
node.h2: it support services that really help your business to succeed,ahead of the game
node.bodytext:
Covering All Your Business Needs

TechVertu is a unique full-service IT agency. We connect with businesses of all sizes, offering all things tech, from IT support and consulting to bespoke infrastructural projects. We take pride in providing fast-paced, high-quality support and delivering expert advice when you need it.

IT Support Services

Fully managed IT Services

Our managed IT Support combines the skills of our highly qualified team with cutting-edge technologies and high levels of customer service.

Complementary IT Services

We understand that some businesses just need a helping hand; that's why we have IT Professionals ready to work alongside your team.

IT Support services that really help your business to succeed

Based in Essex and with offices in London and Surrey, our IT Support team provides reliable and efficient IT services to businesses and in-house teams across several different industries.

Ahead of the game

On our own or as part of your IT team, we work with and for your business, delivering high-class customer service and outstanding levels of professionalism and technological expertise. Our in-depth knowledge within the IT & Communications field gives us an unique advantage and access to new technologies, top of the range equipment and the most efficient software.

High-class customer service

Professional & experienced Helpdesk

Leading-edge technology

Full transparency on services and prices

Handy & easy to use Client Portal

ISO Accredited Company

Our partners

We put a great deal of effort and time into the developing the right partnerships.

node.metadescription: Elevate your business with Complementary IT Support from TechVertu. We're your extension for IT excellence, offering quick solutions and enhanced abilities.
node.h2: could your in-house it team use some extra help?,what we do?,client portal,latest numbers
node.bodytext:
Complementary IT Support

Based in Essex and with offices in London and Surrey, our IT Support teams work mainly with businesses in need of IT Support in London and the South East, but we also have clients spread all over the UK.

Could your in-house IT team use some extra help?

Our Complementary IT Support services are fully tailored to your specific needs. You pick and choose where and when your in-house teams could benefit from having some additional IT Support.

Our IT experts work as an extension of your in-house team

No more delays on fixing IT problems

Enhance your IT abilities and increase efficiency

Accredited & experienced team

Cutting-edge tech knowhow

Excellent customer service

What we do?

Helpdesk IT Support

You can have our 1st and 2nd line Support technicians working as an extension of your company to be the first point of contact for your in-house team.

3rd Line Support

If you prefer to have your in-house IT department doing the daily front-line support to your company, you can always use the help and expertise of our certified team to help you sorting out more complex or time-consuming IT issues.

Emergency support

Our qualified IT engineers can help your team getting through critical problems in a faster, more efficient way, whenever emergencies occur.

Client portal

Your in-house team will be given access to our Client Portal right from the start. This will allow us to develop a simple, quick and transparent communications’ channel and efficiently deal with ongoing tickets and more complex projects. Furthermore, our software will automatically flag up and report on common and recurrent issues that are taking up your company’s time so we can book tailored training sessions. This will free up your internal human resources so they can spend more time on what really matters.

"

Our aim is to help making businesses more efficient and profitable through technology.

"

Certifications

ISO 9001:2015

We detain certification to the internationally recognised ISO 9001:2015 standard, which means we have a Quality Management System in place to ensure the consistency and improvement, leading to high levels of performance and customer satisfaction.

ISO 27001

With our accreditation to the Information Security Management Standard in place, we prove that we are able to minimise risks to potential data security breaches and reduce errors and costs, while demonstrating credibility and trust.

Cyber Essentials

Achieving this certification demonstrates our commitment to cyber security and means that the measures currently in place will protect against the vast majority of common cyber attacks.

Our partners

We put a great deal of effort and time into the developing the right partnerships.

Latest Numbers

3,956

Service Desk Tickets resolved in the last 6 months

98.1%

Resolution met

10 seconds

Average call waiting time

From our blog

Cartoon Contest - 2021

What is Cloud Computing, and Why Do You Need It?

020 3821 1119

info@techvertu.co.uk

Grays

London

Chessington

Canterbury

You can verify the validity of our ISO certificates by entering our certificates number ‍215596 and 217909 via this link: https://www.british-assessment.co.uk/verify-certification/

© Copyright TechVertu 2023.

Privacy PolicyJohn F Hunt Group

node.metadescription: Experience fully managed IT Support in London and the South East. TechVertu provides a range of services, saving time and ensuring data security.
node.h2: in london and the south east,all the it services you need, in one place,how it works?,client portal,benefits,latest numbers
node.bodytext:
Fully managed IT Support

in London and the South East

From our different offices, we can confidently offer local IT Support in London, Essex and Surrey but also in any other areas of the UK.

Get A Free Quote

All the IT services you need, in one place

Having a good IT Support plan and structure in place is essential for businesses of all sizes and sectors. That’s where we come in. We provide your company with some of the best IT Support solutions available in the market and our teams take care of everything for you.

IT Helpdesk Support

24/7 servers monitoring

Managed security

Backup & disaster recovery

Monthly reporting

Infrastructure management and monitoring

Onsite visits

Regular training & support on new software’s

Proactive installation of the latest updates & security patches on all devices

Office 365 migration and support

Virtualisation

Detecting and resolving IT issues before they affect your business

How it works?

1

You get in touch by phone or email

2

We schedule a meeting, get to know your business and evaluate what your needs are

3

After running a FREE IT AUDIT to your company, together we decide on the IT Support services your business requires and agree on a plan of action

4

Once our IT engineers have deployed our software into your company, we will take all the stress away from you – the days of not knowing where your equipment is located, or if your servers are up to date, or even if your computer is about to crash, will be long gone

5

You’ll get access to our Client Portal from day 1, meaning that you can start raising tickets and working on projects with us right away.

Ready to start? Get in touch

Client Portal

Our IT Support management system gives you the ability, not only to raise new tasks which are automatically allocated to one or more of our IT experts, but also to interact with any ongoing projects. This makes each stage of our work completely transparent and opens a direct and quick line of communication between your company and our IT Support team.

Benefits

Become paperless. Save money. Free up time. Whether your needs are, we are here to help.

Keep your data always safe

Save money, time and internal resources when dealing with IT issues

Automatically get the latest software updates

Full IT Support tailored to your company’s needs

Certifications

ISO 9001:2015

We detain certification to the internationally recognised ISO 9001:2015 standard, which means we have a Quality Management System in place to ensure the consistency and improvement, leading to high levels of performance and customer satisfaction.

ISO 27001

With our accreditation to the Information Security Management Standard in place, we prove that we are able to minimise risks to potential data security breaches and reduce errors and costs, while demonstrating credibility and trust.

Cyber Essentials

Achieving this certification demonstrates our commitment to cyber security and means that the measures currently in place will protect against the vast majority of common cyber attacks.

Our partners

We put a great deal of effort and time into the developing the right partnerships.

Latest Numbers

93.1%

First Response met

98.1%

Resolution met

10 seconds

Average call waiting time

node.pagetitle: IT Support Services Company | Remote & On-site | TechVertu
node.metadescription: Boost your business with tailored IT support from TechVertu. Choose fully managed or complementary solutions for cost-effective, efficient IT services.
node.h1: it support tailored to your business needs
node.h3: fully managed it support,complementary it support,why techvertu it support services?,industries we work with,the benefits of outsourced it support services
node.h4: team of it support experts,full transparency supporting services,uk based it support services,no hidden fees,quick slas
node.bodytext:
IT Support tailored to your business needs

A good and efficient IT & Communications system is crucial for any business to succeed. At TechVertu, we offer IT Support solutions that are carefully tailored to your company. Whether you need someone to take over and fully manage your company’s IT services, or you’re just looking for that much-needed help for your in-house team, we are sure to have a solution to suit your needs!

Fully managed IT support

With our integrated and tailored IT Support solutions, we take control of your IT systems and manage everything for you. We become part of your company, offering you a trusted and optimal way of organising your business, so you and your team won’t waste any more time tied up on IT issues.

Fully Managed IT Support

Complementary IT support

No matter how big or small your in-house IT department is, we’re here to help. Our IT experts will become an extension of your team, adding into the mix any additional expertise or tech support you may need. We’re here to help when you are struggling to succeed and to enhance the great work that you're already doing.

Complementary IT Support

Why TechVertu IT support services?

Just a handful of reasons for choosing us to enhance your IT skillset.

Team of IT support experts

This is how our IT tech support works: our IT Helpdesk team is your first line of support and all our IT consultants are just a phone call or an email away during normal working hours. If necessary, our IT experts will remotely access your systems or schedule an onsite visit to fix any issues.

Full transparency supporting services

Our Client Portal gives you and your team full access to all our work right from the beginning, so everything we do is completely transparent. This means there won’t be any surprises when you get the bill.

UK based IT support services

With teams of IT experts spread across different offices, we can provide IT Support in London, Essex, Surrey and nationwide.

No hidden fees

Our services and charges are crystal-clear. You pay for the services you choose to have – nothing more.

Quick SLAs

Our IT experts are fast in solving IT support issues and are proud of meeting deadlines. Our Service Level Agreements (SLAs) vary due to the nature of your request, but our team’s mojo is to always work as swiftly as possible to resolve any problems that might be affecting your business.

Industries we work with

Our IT Services cater for all different business' needs. And we can't wait to work with yours.

Construction

Cleaning

Power

Retail

& yours

The benefits of outsourced IT support services

From cost and time savings to a greater peace of mind, these are some of the main reasons why you should trust your IT systems to us:

Save money in IT recruitment and training

Free up your company’s internal resources

Compete with larger businesses

Consistent and controlled monthly IT expenses

Your data is always safe

Our partners

We put a great deal of effort and time into the developing the right partnerships.

node.metadescription: Boost productivity with Microsoft Office 365 from TechVertu. Access your work anytime, anywhere, with great value as a Microsoft Certified Partner.
node.bodytext:
Microsoft Office 365

Microsoft Office 365 is much more than just Word or email; it’s all the tools you need to work, combined in one place, so you can access them anywhere and at any time. As a Microsoft Silver Partner, we can get you the exact packages and deals your business has been looking for and meet even the most demanding requirements. Our experienced and knowledgeable team is currently implementing these services across a multitude of companies and our clients are already experiencing the benefits of having a cloud-based subscription service personalised to fit their unique business’ needs.

Combine some of the old favourites, like Excel and Outlook, with industry-leading collaborative cloud services like Microsoft Teams

Create, edit and access your work from any device, anywhere, whenever you need

Get frequent updates & software latest versions

Password protected for added security and peace of mind

Get it for a better value from a Microsoft Certified Partner

Our partners

We put a great deal of effort and time into the developing the right partnerships.

From our blog

TechVertu Achieves ISO Certification from the British Assessment Bureau

The Importance of Proactive IT Support

node.metadescription: Simplify printing with TechVertu's efficient Print Management Software. Print from any device, reduce waste, and save costs effortlessly.
node.h2: printing should be easy and straightforward...right?
node.bodytext:
Printing Solutions

Printing should be easy and straightforward... right?

Well, that's not always the case. In fact, if you're reading this, you're probably thinking it's exactly the opposite most of the time. Our Help Desk Technicians are always dealing with printing related requests raised by our clients, so we knew we needed to get to the bottom of the problem, to improve their printing experience, whilst making it cost effective for the business. Luckily for you, we implemented a Print Management Software to help minimise waste, while still enabling you to enjoy easy printing. Sorted!

Check out how we made printing more efficient to our clients

Print from any device, at any time

Several secure print release options

Less waste

Benefit from user & printer usage reporting

Our partners

We put a great deal of effort and time into the developing the right partnerships.

From our blog

Computers Donated to Local Charities

TechVertu Donates 35 Computers to Local Community

node.pagetitle: Privacy Policy for the Website - TechVertu
node.metadescription: The purpose of this privacy notice is to outline the personal data that is processed from the TechVertu website. Click to find out more!
node.h2: what personal information we collect and why we use it?,cookies,legal basis for processing,who we share your data with,how long is your data stored,your rights under the general data protection act,complaints,contact us
node.bodytext:
Privacy Policy

TechVertu Ltd (“we”, “us”) respect the right to privacy of every individual who visits our website.The purpose of this privacy notice is to outline the personal data that is processed from the TechVertu website and to notify visitors of how that data is used and their rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) For the purpose of the General Data Protection Regulation 2018 (“GDPR”), the data controller is TechVertu Ltd and any of its subsidiaries or any other TechVertu associated company

What personal information we collect and why we use it?

  • Contact details including full name and email address from correspondence where you use our ‘Contact us’ form – We collect this data to provide you with information regarding products or services that you have requested from us.
  • Computer or device information (E.g. Your IP address) this information helps us to create statistical data such as number of views to our website in each geographical location.
  • Background information (if applying for a position through the website) address, previous work experience, qualification and references.

Cookies

Cookies contain information that is transferred to your computer’s hard drive. They help us to improve our site and to deliver a better and more personalised service. Some cookies are essential to the operation of our site. They enable us:

  • To speed up your searches;
  • To recognise when you return to our site;
  • To make your browsing experience more efficient.

You can set your browser not to accept cookies and the following link https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/95647 tells you more information and how to remove cookies from your browser. If you choose not to allow cookies you may be unable to access certain parts of Our Site.Cookies are automatically deleted after 14 days.

Legal basis for processing

TechVertu will only contact you where you have given consent for us to do so, i.e. contacting us via our ‘Contact us’ form or directly emailing info@techvertu.co.uk. This information will strictly be used to respond to your query and may be passed within the TechVertu to provide you with the information requested.TechVertu have a legitimate interest in using IP addresses to create statistical geographical data, this information helps us to determine how many users have visited the site from each geographic location.

Who we share your data with

We may disclose your personal data to any member of our group, which means our ultimate holding company and any of its subsidiaries or any other TechVertu associated company.We use Google Analytics to collect and compile statistical data, an IP address without additional data cannot identify an individual.

How long is your data stored

We do not process your personal data collected from www.techvertu.co.uk for longer than is necessary to provide you with information, products or services that you have requested from us.Should your C.V be of interest to us and we do not have a position available for you at the time, we will keep your details on file for up to 12 months and contact you should a suitable position become available.If you enter into a contractual agreement based on our correspondence or ask us to do something before entering into a contractual agreement (E.g. provide a quote), you will need to view our Customer Privacy Notice for more information on our Retention Policy, which will be given to you upon receipt of a quote.

Your Rights under the General Data Protection Act

  • The right to be informed
  • The right of access
  • The right to rectification
  • The right to erasure
  • The right to restrict processing
  • The right to data portability
  • The right to object
  • Rights in relation to automated decision making and profiling.

For more information on your rights under the General Data Protection Act (GDPR) visit https://ico.org.uk/for-organisations/guide-to-the-general-data-protection-regulation-gdpr/individual-rights/

Complaints

You have the right to make a complaint to the relevant supervisory authority which is the Information commissioner’s office (ICO) if you think your personal information has been handled incorrectly.

Contact us

If you require further information or have any questions regarding this Privacy Notice, then please email the Group Data Protection Officer dataprotection@techvertu.co.uk or telephone us on 01375 366700 or write to us at: Data Protection Officer TechVertu Limited London Road Grays Essex RM20 4DB This privacy policy only covers information collected via the www.techvertu.co.uk website, for more information on our Privacy Notices please contact dataprotection@johnfhunt.co.uk

020 3821 1119

info@techvertu.co.uk

Grays

London

Chessington

Canterbury

You can verify the validity of our ISO certificates by entering our certificates number ‍215596 and 217909 via this link: https://www.british-assessment.co.uk/verify-certification/

© Copyright TechVertu 2023.

Privacy PolicyJohn F Hunt Group

node.metadescription: TechVertu's Quality Policy ensures ISO 9001:2015 & ISO 27001:2013 compliance, exceeding client expectations and delivering top-quality services.
node.h2: it is the objective of this quality policy to:,these objectives are supported by the following customer orientated objectives:,these objectives are achieved by:
node.bodytext:
QUALITY POLICY STATEMENT CP002

The Managing Director is committed to providing the Physical, Logistical and Operational platform necessary to manage all IT Support and Digital Marketing Service activities. This is achieved through a team of highly qualified and skilled employees who are committed to ensure that TechVertu satisfies the specific needs and requirements of all our clients, while at the same time meeting our Legal and Regulatory responsibilities. TechVertu is committed to maintain a quality and information security system designed to meet the requirements of ISO9001:2015 & ISO 27001:2013 in pursuit of its primary objectives, the purpose and the context of the organisation.

It is the objective of this Quality Policy to:

  • Provide services to our own high standards.
  • Satisfy our Client’s needs and expectations.
  • Ensure that risk to information in the care of TechVertu is minimised or eliminated.
  • Conform to contractual and regulatory requirements.
  • To continually improve overall efficiency and effectiveness

These objectives are supported by the following customer orientated objectives:

  • To exceed client expectations in terms of service delivery.
  • To continually review, refine and improve our communication, co-ordination and process management activities.
  • To provide first class training to all TechVertu employees.
  • To monitor and continually improve our levels of client satisfaction.

These objectives are achieved by:

  • Developing staff competencies, creativity, empowerment and accountability through appropriate training programs and show strong management involvement and commitment
  • Providing all employees with the necessary resources, equipment, instruction and training to fulfil work requirements.
  • Implementing a central CRM (Customer Relationship Management) System which will organise, record and monitor the performance of every individual employee as well as the communication with the customers, the level of customer satisfaction and the overall performance of the business.
  • Ensuring that all equipment and methods of working are safe and without risk to health and safety.

As TechVertu is part of the John F Hunt Group of companies, the IMS Manager should work closely and under the supervision of the Group Compliance Department to ensure requirements are implemented and maintained and TechVertu business activities are in line with the Groups Policies in place. The Integrated Business Management System is regularly reviewed through in-house and external audits conducted by British Assessment Bureau Ltd who are a UKAS Accredited Assessment Body. This policy is reviewed annually by the IMS Manage under supervision of John F Hunt Group Compliance Department and is publicly available through our web site or by request from the Head Office.

node.pagetitle: Security Management Policy Statement CP002 | TechVertu
node.metadescription: TechVertu's Security Management Policy ensures ISO 9001:2015 & ISO 27001:2013 compliance, protecting information and delivering secure services.
node.h2: it is the objective of this information security policy to:,these objectives are supported by the following customer orientated objectives:,these objectives are achieved by:
node.bodytext:
SECURITY MANAGEMENT POLICY STATEMENT CP001

This Information Security Policy document is aimed to define the security requirements for the proper and secure use of the Information Technology services at TechVertu. Its goal is to protect the company and its users to the maximum extent possible against security threats that could jeopardize their integrity, privacy, reputation and business outcomes. The scope of this policy relates to use of the database and computer systems operated by the company at its office in London Road Grays, Essex in pursuit of the company’s business of providing IT services to the users of information technology across different businesses. It also relates where appropriate, to external risk sources including functions which are outsourced. It will explain the Purpose, Scope and Responsibilities in relation to Information Security Management System (ISMS) and the required practices necessary for different Information Technology (IT) services within the company’s business process. The complete Information Security Policy document is available to everyone at the company’s SharePoint. This document alongside other required documents are the foundation to establish an effective Information Security Management System for TechVertu. ‍ TechVertu is committed to maintain a quality and information security system designed to meet the requirements of ISO9001:2015 & ISO 27001:2013 in pursuit of its primary objectives, the purpose and the context of the organisation.

It is the objective of this information security policy to:

  • Provide services within a secure environment.
  • Ensure the correct and secure operation of information processing facilities.
  • Ensure that risk to information in the care of TechVertu is minimised or eliminated.
  • Conform to contractual and regulatory requirements in relation to the Information Security.
  • To continually improve overall efficiency and effectiveness of information security and service delivery to our clients.

These objectives are supported by the following customer orientated objectives:

  • To increase customer’s confidence concerning the security of the information in the care of TechVertu
  • Provide management direction and support for information security in accordance with business requirements and relevant laws and regulations.
  • To minimize the risk of systems failures

These objectives are achieved by:

  • Providing first class training to all TechVertu employees about the Information Security.
  • Controlling access to information
  • To implement and maintain the appropriate level of information security and service delivery in line with third party service delivery agreements
  • Continually review and improve our Information Security Policies by analysing recorded security incident.

As TechVertu is part of the John F Hunt Group of companies, the IMS Manger and the Information and Cybersecurity Officer at TechVertu who are responsible for the monitoring of the ISMS policies and procedures, should work closely with the Group Compliance Department ensuring the requirement of the Integrated Business and Information Security Management System are implemented and maintained. Integrated Business and Information Security Management System is regularly reviewed through in-house and external audits conducted by British Assessment Bureau Ltd who are a UKAS Accredited Assessment Body. This policy is reviewed annually by the Security Committee at the IMS Management Meeting Review and is publicly available through our web site or by request from the Head Office.

Hadi Marashy Managing Director November 2018

node.pagetitle: Business Telecoms - calls over the cloud | TechVertu
node.metadescription: Upgrade your business telecoms to the cloud with TechVertu. Explore Microsoft Teams, 8x8, and RingCentral for clear, flexible, and cost-effective solutions.
node.bodytext:
Send your calls to the cloud

Cloud-based Communications providers give us more freedom so we can be as flexible as necessary when the time comes to meet your exact needs and requirements. We have an experienced team ready to deploy any software and implement it smoothly, with minimal disruption, throughout your organisation, no matter how big or small. We use these services ourselves so you’re more than welcome to pay us a visit and experience them first-hand.

Microsoft Teams is a cloud-based team collaboration software, part of the Office 365 suite. The core capabilities in Microsoft Teams include business messaging, calling, video meetings and file sharing.

8x8 is the world's first Communications Cloud, combining unified communications, team collaboration interoperability, contact centre and analytics in a single, open and real-time platform

RingCentral Office is a cloud-based PBX system for businesses and its features include call auto-attendant, company directory, call forwarding and handling, multiple extensions, a mobile app for iPhone and Android, Business SMS, video conferencing and screen-sharing, and fax.

Crystal clear communications

Better audio quality

No need to set up on permanent servers

More cost effective and efficient

Our partners

We put a great deal of effort and time into the developing the right partnerships.

node.pagetitle: IT consultants London | IT support company Essex | TechVertu
node.metadescription: TechVertu is a fast growing IT support company in London and Essex, providing fully managed IT Support and Complementary IT Support services for our clients.
node.h1: your one-stop shop for all things tech
node.h2: how did it happen?,our values,how it works?
node.bodytext:
Your one-stop shop for all things tech

TechVertu is a full-service IT agency with offices in Essex, London, and Surrey, offering a full range of IT support services for businesses of all sizes. We make businesses thrive through all things digital, by helping them unlock the incredible potential of technology and marketing.

How did it happen?

TechVertu started in November 2017, when the John F Hunt Group invested in a small IT support company, at the time named Ruuz, founded in 2012 by Hadi Marashy, TechVertu’s current Managing Director. What started almost exclusively as a central in-house hub for the Group's day to day IT support requirements quickly developed into a full-service technological company. Just a few months after TechVertu was born, the business took over the IT support services for all companies within the John F Hunt Group, managing over 500 users ever since. Some of the Group’s main branding and web development assignments soon came, followed by external clients and projects, enabling TechVertu to diversify its know-how. Its current portfolio includes a wide array of industries, ranging from the construction sector to retail, education and hospitality.

Nowadays, TechVertu has all the resources, time and expertise to support or fully manage the IT systems for any other business, and it also offers comprehensive backup and disaster recovery services. We use the latest tools, creative thinking and cutting-edge technology to bring real benefits to your business. Younger members of the team bring fresh ideas to the mix, while senior specialists ensure we deliver the customer focus, professionalism and service standards that dynamic businesses demand. What’s more, we’re open and transparent about our pricing and all aspects of how we work. In doing so, we build deeper trust and long-lasting client relationships.

Our Values

TechVertu is built on passion, innovation, creativity, collaboration and transparency. These are the values that guide us – and we always dig deep for our clients. Our reliable and responsive team is dedicated to delivering excellent customer service and highly accomplished projects, every single time.

Get A Free Quote

Passion

Innovation

Creativity

Collaboration

Transparency

How it works?

01

Meet

First things first. Let’s have an informal chat over a cuppa. Getting to know our clients and building trust is how we like to kick off every project. We get to boil down exactly what you’re looking for and work out the best way we can help. Hot drinks are on us.

02

Plan

Now we need to look at your project in more detail. We'll be asking a lot of questions. What's your objective? Who's your audience? What are your strengths and weaknesses? If you don't have the answers, don't worry - our friendly team of professionals will help you find them. With a thorough brief in place, it's time to create some magic. Our team uses their technical and creative wizardry to produce practical, efficient, and engaging solutions that will wow you and, most importantly, your end-users.

03

Test

An enjoyable user experience is fundamental. So before we fire up the engines and launch your new project, we need to test its functionality and usability. At this stage, we’ll fully analyse your project and get feedback on it from objective users. Any issues – with the services, design, navigation, interface, or anything else – we’ll fix them.

04

Launch

After a thoroughly rigorous process packed with creative sweat and passionate production and testing, it’s time to launch your project. Launch day is a huge moment for your business. And we’ll give you lots of suggestions to ensure the biggest impact. 3-2-1… lift off!

Ready to start? Get in touch

node.pagetitle: Junior IT Support Technician position at TechVertu Ltd
node.metadescription: Junior IT Support Technician position at TechVertu Ltd, Grays, Essex. Hands-on role, server experience required. Join our dynamic team!
node.h2: main responsibilities,core skills, knowledge and attributes,experience:
node.bodytext:
Junior IT Support Technician

TechVertu Ltd, Grays, Essex RM20

Application Closed

We are currently looking for a hands-on IT Support Technician, with technical experience using Windows Servers.

As an IT Support Technician, you will be responsible for providing a high level of technical support, including daily support incidents, desktop and server troubleshooting and execution, hardware/software installation and upgrades, new infrastructure build outs and relocations. As the ideal candidate, you must be a confident, eloquent and professional communicator, as you will be required to liaise with high profile clients on a day to day basis.

Main responsibilities

  • Provide superior service to customers.
  • Develop and maintain close working relationships and interaction with the company's Management and Clients.
  • Regular communications with customers and ensure they are satisfied with IT service levels.
  • Develop both the technical and customer service skills of all members of the team.
  • Assist the support team with daily activities (i.e. part of team, hands-on involvement, technical guidance and leadership).
  • Responsible for IT Helpdesk Team and Helpdesk Operations
  • Create and maintain documentation and diagrams of office infrastructure, underlying services and systems.
  • Periodically review appropriateness of technologies used, provide recommendations and drive the implementation of improvements.

Core Skills, Knowledge and Attributes

  • Significant experience in a similar IT Support role.
  • Extensive overall IT experience,
  • MCSE qualification and/or related degrees.
  • Skilled in hardware performance monitoring, analysis and capacity planning.
  • Strong knowledge of Active Directory topologies and office 365 systems.
  • Network and application security. Threat management gateway Email scanning technologies.
  • Experience with implementing new processes and following through with required disciplines
  • Excellent collaboration and communication/interpersonal skills.
  • Strong customer service ethics and sense of urgency
  • Demonstrates and acts as a role model for the companies group values and behaviours.
  • Quick turnaround on instructions or requests from senior management.
  • Ability to perform well in team environments.
  • Ability to deliver and coordinate projects within tight deadlines. General understanding of project management methodologies.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills. Willingness to learn, explore new ideas and innovate.
  • Excellent attention to detail. A proactive, flexible and adaptable approach.

Experience:

  • IT SUPPORT: 1 year (Required)
  • Customer Service: 1 year (Preferred)

You will receive full support and training from the senior engineers and will be expected to be willing to constantly learn new skills and technologies.

The working hours for the role are 8:30 to 5:30, Monday to Friday

The role is a fantastic opportunity for an enthusiastic helpdesk analyst or support analyst who is bored in their current role and wants to join a very friendly and busy team, in a business that has ambitious growth plans.

This IT Support Technician role is based in Grays, Essex and is commutable from East London, Central London and the Essex area.

node.pagetitle: IT Manager position at TechVertu Ltd, Grays, Essex
node.metadescription: IT Manager position at TechVertu Ltd, Grays, Essex. Join our expanding IT team. Must-have experience in IT management and strong technical skills.
node.bodytext:
IT Manager

TechVertu Ltd, Grays, Essex RM20

Application Closed

TechVertu is a well-established IT Company part of John F Hunt Group. Due to our expansion, we are looking for an IT manager to join the team based in Grays (RM20). We are looking for a manager who has a solid understanding of the latest technologies to start ASAP. There are some fantastic benefits that come with the role as well as a generous starting salary.

Candidates must demonstrate initiative and problem-solving skills, combined with a focus on customer service. You should be passionate about meeting user's requirements, using the right resources and applying commercial insight to help meet their needs. In return, you will get to work with a wide range of technologies alongside a friendly and dedicated team, in a great environment.

Main responsibilities

  • Day to day management of the service desk team, ensuring adequate cover for taking calls and resolving incidents
  • Management of all customer incidents and service requests, ensuring they are resolved within SLA
  • Lead the activities of IT Operations, covering all aspects of Service Desk and Infrastructure
  • Create and maintain the best practice standards for Local IT operations
  • To take part in IT projects, contributing with technical input, and to participate when required as a full-time project team member, or as a project leader, according to the needs of the project
  • Maintain a high degree of customer service for all support queries
  • Manage all risks and issues, ensuring mitigation plans are in place
  • Ensure all documentation and policies are kept up to date and accurate
  • Responsibility for IT risks across all entities
  • Comfortable working outside of core working hours when necessary to complete the task in hand.

Essential Requirements:

  • Minimum of 5 years’ experience within IT, ideally with formal IT related qualifications – MCSE, MCSA, MCP etc
  • Minimum 3 years’ team management experience within an IT related environment
  • Experience across Windows Server admin 2008-2016, Active Directory, Hyper-V
  • Active Directory administration in an Azure synchronised environment
  • Office 365 administration including Microsoft SharePoint, Teams and Exchange 365
  • Networking, router & switch configuration including VLAN, VPN, WAN, LAN and DNS including Cisco / Meraki and Virtual appliances
  • Understanding of MS PowerShell commands and scripts
  • Experience working in a similar role in a busy environment
  • Proven ability to learn new and complex software applications
  • Capable of communicating clearly, concisely and confidently with a wide range of people
  • Pro-active and innovative approach to problem-solving and ability to multi-task
  • Understanding of IP telephony systems
  • Strong cyber security experience and awareness of trends and threats
  • Highly experienced in planning resource activity across complex technologies
  • People management and leadership skills
  • Formal training and Certification in ITIL and Prince 2 is desirable

This role is based in Grays, RM20, and it’s easily commutable from East London, Central London and the Essex area.

We are looking to fill this opportunity immediately, so please get in touch to discuss it further.

Application is currently closed

node.pagetitle: Remote Work Case Study Tech Project - TechVertu
node.metadescription: TechVertu quickly enabled remote work for John F Hunt with Microsoft Teams, secure network connectivity, and streamlined document management.
node.h2: the problem,the request,the solution,the implementation,the benefits
node.h4: microsoft teams,network connectivity to all offices,managing and sharing documents and forms,introducing employees own devices
node.bodytext:
John F Hunt

Remote Work

The Problem

As the corona virus quickly spreads, several organisations recognise the importance and need for their employees to work from home. And our clients are no exception.

The Request

In a combined effort to slow down the spread of the virus and keep their staff safe, John F Hunt Group has requested TechVertu to implement all the necessary infrastructure which would enable all their staff to work from home with immediate effect.

Fortunately, many of the solutions presented and detailed below were already in place across several John F Hunt companies and divisions, implemented by our teams in the past. Therefore, our IT technicians had to act quickly and efficiently to make sure that 350 employees could carry on with their daily tasks with no disruption to the overall business.

‍

The Solution

Microsoft Teams

All John F Hunt employees are able to communicate and work on projects in real time, from any location. Microsoft Teams is compatible with any software and device, allowing all members of staff to quickly message other individuals or groups.

Microsoft Teams videocall functionality has made remote meetings easier. It has even enabled site managers to get a first-person view of any ongoing projects, allowing them to review and survey multiple sites across the country much faster and without leaving the same place.

Voice calls have been diverted from desk phones to work mobiles through Microsoft Teams software, with no changes to any current infrastructure or phone numbers.

Due to the urgency of recent events, John F Hunt didn’t have much time to purchase equipment or deploy new software to all employees. By using Microsoft Teams, TechVertu was able to, seamlessly and effortlessly, implement this across thousands of already existing devices, without disturbing the company’s workflow.

Network connectivity to all offices

Employees were a bit sceptical about accessing their work files and servers when working from home. However, TechVertu has enabled John F Hunt staff to work from any location by providing the business with their very own private VPN. This has been setup for all users who wish to access the company server without the hassle of coming to head office.

Managing and sharing documents and forms

John F Hunt employees already use SharePoint, a cloud-based service for document management and storage.

TechVertu has also converted esoteric forms to be more user-friendly by using PowerApps, meaning that all data is now saved directly to the cloud, which facilitates all forms’ process, reducing times and increasing profit and productivity.

With both applications in place, John F Hunt employees are able to easily access business data, speed up shared business processes and securely share sensitive information, no matter their location.

Introducing employees own devices

Techvertu has allowed John F Hunt employees to introduce their own devices in line with BOYD policies, such as laptops and computers, to be used for work purposes. By using the cloud-based platforms and solutions presented above, all members of staff can just pick up their devices and start working.

node.pagetitle: Mobile Device Management (MDM) Case Study - TechVertu
node.metadescription: TechVertu's MDM solution secured ACE's devices, ensured compliance, and enhanced productivity, earning client trust and satisfaction.
node.h2: the problem,the request,the solution,the implementation,the benefits
node.bodytext:
Asbestos Consultants Europe

Mobile Device Management (MDM)

The Problem

Our client Asbestos Consultants Europe (ACE) were close to losing their client over a security issue as their devices weren’t compliant with any of their client’s requests and they were unable to fulfil these requirements with their current systems in place.

The Request

ACE has asked us to take commercially reasonable precautions to secure any mobile devices used by their staff members to access a client’s software, including: enforcing a strong PIN or password policy; applying encryption on the devices; and allowing remote wipe of any lost or tstolen device upon request.

The Solution

TechVertu suggested the use of MDM to manage their devices on site as this would allow ACE to control the data and encryption available on all devices. It would also give the company full control of the security settings, including the ability to wipe any mobile devices if required, and therefore protecting the client’s data.

The Implementation

A roll out plan was organised with our engineers and then issued to all ACE employees’ mobile phones and tablets. This deployment was pushed out into groups for the on-field surveyors and delegated permissions were provided to each device with auditing.

The Benefits

By offering ACE the ability to implement MDM on their devices, our team at TechVertu has allowed our client to continue the work with their own customer without any disturbance, while being compliant with their very specific requests. This has increased productivity and helped monitoring staff’s time, at the same time it allows ACE to provide high standards of security and reliability to their clients.

After working with TechVertu, I found the whole process from start to finish to be a very smooth and easy experience. Due to TechVertu’s very responsive and professional manner we were able to meet our client’s deadline and more importantly the security issue. Any issues or questions that needed answering, the company were always there to respond. I will be highly recommending TechVertu to all of our clients for their future projects. Thank you TechVertu!

Philip Bowen
